match.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName = "AEXP_BlackFootedFerret" or defName = "AEXP_BlackRhino" or defName = "AEXP_Bonobo" or defName = "AEXP_Moa" or defName = "AEXP_Panda" or defName = "AEXP_Quagga" or defName = "AEXP_RockhopperPenguin" or defName = "AEXP_TasmanianDevil" or defName = "AEXP_Thylacine" or defName = "AEXP_AfricanWildDog"]/race[not(packAnimal)]
